com.ibm.team.scm.client
Interface IChangeHistoryDescriptor

public interface IChangeHistoryDescriptor

This structure encapsulates the basic state of a change history era in a single structure, which is fetched & returned atomically from the Jazz SCM Server. Clients can be assured that this an era at some point existed in the repository with exactly this set of recent entries & the specified previous history pointer.

Since:
0.6

Method Summary
 IChangeHistory previousHistory()
          Returns an object that can be used to access the earlier history.
 java.util.List recent()
          Returns the list of change sets made in the era of this change history.
 

Method Detail

recent

java.util.List recent()
                      throws TeamRepositoryException
Returns the list of change sets made in the era of this change history. The change sets are arranged in approximate chronological order (in terms of when they were applied to the object, such as a workspace, which has the change history, rather than by their absolute creation dates). The change sets are intended to be applied in that order to the configuration corresponding to the previous history. This operation fails if this change history is not available.

Note that a workspace's active change sets are included in its change history (after the closed change sets).

Note: Accepting baselines IWorkspaceConnection.accept(int, IWorkspaceConnection, IChangeHistorySyncReport, List, List, IProgressMonitor) may significantly re-order the change sets in recent entries. Clients should be written with this in mind.

Returns:
the list of change sets (element type: IChangeHistoryEntry); the elements are in chronological order (element 0 is the least recent, with the last element being the most recent in history); no duplicates; unmodifiable and fixed; never null, although the list can be empty. Nested change sets may contain state-ids if this history descriptor was retrieved with that option enabled.
Throws:
TeamRepositoryException - if the operation fails for any other reason

previousHistory

IChangeHistory previousHistory()
                               throws TeamRepositoryException
Returns an object that can be used to access the earlier history. This operation fails if this change history is not available.

Returns:
the previous change history, or null if this is the initial era
Throws:
TeamRepositoryException - if the operation fails for any other reason
